thread.title: - China World Hotel, Beijing Offers Moon Cakes and Hampers for Mid-Autumn Festival -
thread.title_full: - China World Hotel, Beijing Offers Moon Cakes and Hampers for Mid-Autumn Festival -

title: - China World Hotel, Beijing Offers Moon Cakes and Hampers for Mid-Autumn Festival -
text:
China World Hotel, Beijing Offers Moon Cakes and Hampers for Mid-Autumn Festival Beijing, China – WEBWIRE – Friday, August 07, 2015 
China World Hotel, Beijing presents the 2015 Moon Cake Collection with 15 different moon cake gift boxes and more than 50 moon cake flavours for this years Mid-Autumn Festival, one of Chinas most celebrated traditional holiday. 
Guests may choose from packaged moon cakes and gift hampers that are ideal for moon gazing with family and friends. 
Mooncake gift box collections: Starry Moonlight (six pieces), RMB158 Momoyama Skin with Chestnut Paste, Peanut and Taro, Orange Walnut, Jasmine Floral, Mango with Milk Custard, Black Currant 
Autumn Moon (four pieces), RMB168 Beijing-Style Zi Lai Hong, Beijing-Style Zi Lai Bai, Red Bean Paste, Black Date Paste 
Moonlight Jade (four pieces), RMB198 Black Date Paste, Black Sesame Paste, Pumpkin Paste, Green Tea Paste 
Disney (10 pieces), RMB198 Momoyama Skin with Chocolate Paste, Chestnut Paste, Black Currant, Pumpkin Paste, Mango with Milk Custard (two of each flavour) 
Autumn Brilliance (eight pieces), RMB218 Momoyama Skin with Cheese Blueberry, Orange Walnut, Peanut and Taro, Black Currant, Jasmine Floral, Mango with Milk Custard 
Snow Skin Mooncake (six pieces), RMB268 Bean Mash, Tea Powder Sorbet, Coffee, Blueberry Sorbet, Kumquat, Mung Mango 
Crescent Moon (two pieces), RMB298 Assorted Nuts, Red Bean Paste 
Plenilune (nine pieces), RMB298 Two White Lotus with Single Egg Yolk, Two Charcoal Walnut and Black Date, Two Mixed Nuts, Shu-Style Red Bean Paste, Cashew Nuts and Yunnan Ham, Low-Cane-Sugar Pumpkin 
Moonlight Beauty (eight pieces), RMB328 Egg Yolk Custard 
(eight pieces), RMB328 Charcoal Walnut and Black Date, Charcoal Milk Custard, Chao-Style Red Bean Paste, Chao-Style Purple Potato Paste (two of each flavour) 
(10 pieces), RMB398 Da Hong Pao Tea, Prune and Black Currant, Mixed Nuts and Cereal, Peanut and Taro, Yunnan-Style Red Bean Paste (two of each flavour) 
(12 pieces), RMB428 Red Lotus, White Lotus, Shu-Style Egg Yolk, Black Date and Walnut, Mixed Nuts, Black Sesame Paste (two of each flavour) 
(12 pieces), RMB598 White Lotus with Single Egg Yolk, Black Date Paste, Black Sesame Paste, Pumpkin Paste, Green Tea Paste, Mixed Nuts, Shu-Style Egg Yolk, Low-Cane-Sugar Pumpkin, Shu-Style Black Pepper and Spiced Salt, Beijing-Style Zi Lai Hong, Beijing-Style Zi Lai Bai, Chao-Style Red Bean Paste 
Meanwhile, The Sweet Spot launches the most innovative Mousse Moon Cakes in the city to celebrate the traditional Mid-Autumn Festival. There are six different flavours to choose from  Raspberry, Chocolate, Vanilla Green Tea, Mango Passion Fruit, Tiramusu and Strawberry. The gift box is priced at only RMB128 and includes three pieces of Mousse Moon Cakes. 
ina National Tourism Administration (CNTA), China World Hotel, Beijing has been named one of the worlds best hotels by both Condé Nast Traveller and Travel + Leisure magazines. The hotel has also been voted Best Hotel in Beijing by Euromoney, Frommers Guide and Finance Asia; Best Business Hotel in Beijing by Business Traveller China and Asia Pacific, TTG Asia, The Asset and Asian Legal Business; ranked one of the Top 10 Business Hotels in China  Golden Pillow Award by 21st Century Business Herald; and named one of The Top 50 Hotels in China by Forbes and Travel + Leisure China.
